# base_context_call

The `BaseContextCall` class for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/base_context_call/index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/base_context_call/index" symbolName="ContextToolDef" /> ContextToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/base_context_call/index" symbolName="BaseContextCall" /> BaseContextCall

A base class for generating responses with context using LLMs.
